name: raspingly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a voice that sounds unpleasantly rough: "It has not been used," she said raspingly. His smooth style is in contrast to his raspingly rough colleague. Related words
rasp
raspy
rasping
More examplesFewer examplesShe is irreverent, lazy, and raspingly witty.He had authority on stage, aided by a raspingly resonant baritone.His raspingly bluesy voice captured the attention of a vast TV audience.All of a sudden his eyes gleam, as he clears his throat, raspingly.
